parameters.name: Icon
parameters.description: Icon to show in the message box as defined in swMessageBoxIcon_e

parameters.name: Buttons
parameters.description: Buttons to show in the message box as defined in swMessageBoxBtn_e

title: ISldWorks.SendMsgToUser2
description: Displays a message box containing a message to the user, who is required to interact with it before continuing.
signature:
System.Int32 SendMsgToUser2( 
   System.String
Message
,
   System.Int32
Icon
,
   System.Int32
Buttons
)

parameters.name: Icon
parameters.description: Icon to show in the message box as defined in swMessageBoxIcon_e

parameters.name: Buttons
parameters.description: Buttons to show in the message box as defined in swMessageBoxBtn_e

returns: Value corresponding to the button the user clicked as defined in swMessageBoxResult_e

examples.title: Get Names of Configurations Using Variant (C++)
